tlslite.utils.chacha module¶

Pure Python implementation of ChaCha cipher

Implementation that follows RFC 7539 closely.

class tlslite.utils.chacha.ChaCha(key, nonce, counter=0, rounds=20)¶

Bases: object

Pure python implementation of ChaCha cipher
